description: Reboot specified Redis node(s). This operation requires write permission to the cache resource. There can be potential data loss.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

reboottype.description: Which Redis node(s) to reboot. Depending on this value data loss is possible.

shardid.description: If clustering is enabled, the ID of the shard to be rebooted.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

name.description: The name of the Redis cache.

parameters.description: Specifies which Redis node(s) to reboot.
